entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning and early this afternoon. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Monday 13 March 2023
